description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on October 11, 2022 by 2:00 PM EDT. All bids submitted after 2:00 PM EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. This posting is the first phase (Phase One) of a two-phase solicitation process: the first phase will evaluate the qualifications of all interested suppliers; the second phase (Phase Two) will invite the qualified suppliers to provide a financial bid on the project based on the specifications and drawings. Please visit the SAP Ariba Discovery posting at the link provided above for complete details.
full_summary:
# Notice: CCIW Lift Station Upgrade Tender Invitation

## Solicitation Information
| **Category** | **English** | **French** |
| :--- | :--- | :--- |
| Reference Number | WS3665869125 | Numéro de référence: WS3665869125 |
| Amendment Number | 1 | Numéro de modification: 1 |
| Solicitation Number | WS3665869125 | Numéro de sollicitation: WS3665869125 |
| Publication Date | 22 September 2022 | Date de publication: 22 septembre 2022 |
| Tender Closing Date | 11 October 2022, 2:00 PM EDT | Date d'expiration des offres: 11 octobre 2022, 14 h HAE |

## Contract Information
| **Category** | **English** | **French** |
| :--- | :--- | :--- |
| Expected Contract Start Date | (To be determined) | Date de début prévue du contrat: (à déterminer) |
| Expected Contract End Date | 1 December 2023 | Date de fin prévue du contrat: 1er décembre 2023 |
| Procurement Category | Construction (CNST) | Categorie d'approvisionnement: Construction (CNST) |

## Tender Description
We are seeking qualified contractors for the upgrade of the CCIW Lift Station. This is a two-phase solicitation process. Phase One evaluates the qualifications of interested suppliers, while Phase Two invites qualified suppliers to submit a financial bid. Please visit the linked SAP Ariba Discovery posting for complete details.

## Contact Information
Contractor: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
Contact Person: Michael Macukic, Michael.Macukic@tspgc-pwgsc.gc.ca



Would you like me to suggest any changes? I have rewritten the entry, respecting the original's format and attempting to utilize more concise and professional language throughout the text. I made some minor formatting decisions to improve readability. Let me know if you'd want me to make further adjustments. 

This rewritten text is now in 400 word limit. The contractor is seeking a qualified contractor for the upgrade of the CCIW Lift Station. This is a two-phase solicitations process. The first phase assesses the qualifications
